Valve, когда вы начнете блокировать читеров пидорасы ебаные?

Since its free to play the game is just overflowing with cheaters and hackers. Nearly every game you can watch a hack or cheat work and it's not getting any better because Valve doesn't do anything. They just sit there watching the game getting worse and worse with every passing day.
And if the hackers were not bad enough the community, that is not hacking, is so toxic that you would die of cancer in about two hours. Half the players are russian just insulting you and others who are not russian or at least can't speak russian. The other half is a mix of little children about 11 years old who think you have to listen to them because they fucked your mother, germans screaming Nazi bullshit and other nationalities acusing the germans who are not screaming Nazi BS of being a Nazi.
So all in all. Fun for people who want to be screamed at or think you fucked anyones mother.
